Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Action
  • public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a complete action that a player can perform in his turn. It can be composed of different elementary tasks, the MicroActions. It also contains some supports variable to keep track of user's choices while completing it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean activateOnlyReloads
      If true, the player can only reloads weapon.
      private Player chosenPlayer
      It's the player chosen during action, used for shooting.

      it's the square chosen by the player, used for shooting.

      Support variable to store the effects currently in process.

      Support variable to store a Mode, if one is selected in the current action.

      Support variable to store a PowerUp, if one is selected in the current action.

      Support variable to store a SpawnSquare, if one is selected in the current action.

      Support variable to store a Weapon, if one is selected in the current action.
      private java.util.List<Player> damaged
      Support variable to keep track of the player damaged (not just marked) in the current shoot action

      If true, the action counter has to be incremented.
      private java.util.List<MicroAction> microActions
      List of microActions composing the current action
      private java.util.List<Mode> selectedModes
      Stores the modes selected in the current action.

    • Field Detail

      • microActions

        private java.util.List<MicroAction> microActions
        List of microActions composing the current action

      • currSpawnSquare

        private SpawnSquare currSpawnSquare
        Support variable to store a SpawnSquare, if one is selected in the current action. used for grabbing a weapon.

      • currWeapon

        private Weapon currWeapon
        Support variable to store a Weapon, if one is selected in the current action. Used for paying a weapon and shoot

      • currMode

        private Mode currMode
        Support variable to store a Mode, if one is selected in the current action. Used for payment.

      • selectedModes

        private java.util.List<Mode> selectedModes
        Stores the modes selected in the current action. Used for create the list of selectable modes, according to their precedence

      • currEffects

        private java.util.List<Effect> currEffects
        Support variable to store the effects currently in process. It is updated by adding a mode or using a power up

      • damaged

        private java.util.List<Player> damaged
        Support variable to keep track of the player damaged (not just marked) in the current shoot action

      • incrementActionCounter

        private boolean incrementActionCounter
        If true, the action counter has to be incremented. True for actual turn actions (move, grab, shoot)

      • activateOnlyReloads

        private boolean activateOnlyReloads
        If true, the player can only reloads weapon. Since the setLoad has to be the last action of the turn, once reloaded one weapon is only possible to setLoad weapons.

      • currPowerUp

        private PowerUp currPowerUp
        Support variable to store a PowerUp, if one is selected in the current action. Used for paying for the targeting scope

      • chosenSquare

        private Square chosenSquare
        it's the square chosen by the player, used for shooting.

      • chosenPlayer

        private Player chosenPlayer
        It's the player chosen during action, used for shooting.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Action

        public Action​(boolean incrementActionCounter,
              boolean activateOnlyReloads)
        Constructs an action specifying the effects on the turn status
        Parameters:
        incrementActionCounter - true if action has to increment the action counter (move, grab, shoot)
        activateOnlyReloads - true for setLoad action

      • Action

        public Action​(boolean incrementActionCounter,
              boolean activateOnlyReloads,
              MicroAction microAction)
        Constructs an action specifying the effects on the turn status and adding the first microAction
        Parameters:
        incrementActionCounter - true if action has to increment the action counter (move, grab, shoot)
        activateOnlyReloads - true for setLoad action
        microAction - the first microAction of the action

      • isIncrementActionCounter

        public boolean isIncrementActionCounter()
        Getter for IncrementActionCounter
        Returns:
